SEARCH
Package net.chaossquad.mclib.executable

Klasse CoreExecutable

java.lang.Object
net.chaossquad.mclib.executable.CoreExecutable
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
ListenerOwner, ListenerRegistrar
public abstract class CoreExecutable extends Object implements ListenerOwner, ListenerRegistrar
Class which provides a TaskScheduler and ManagedListener cleanup system.
Can be a base class for gamemodes.

    • tick

      public final boolean tick()
      Should be called by a bukkit task to execute the executables tasks.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if executed successfully. False if it should be stopped by the plugin.

    • shouldExecute

      @OverrideOnly public boolean shouldExecute()
      The tasks will be executed as long as this method returns true.
      If it returns false, no tasks will be executed and the plugin is told that the executable should be removed.
      override only, this method always returns true in the base class
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the tasks should be executed
